Name: Lentil and Rhubarb Stew With Indian Spices
Steps:
Mince Garlic and Ginger
Chop and remove strings from Rhubarb stalks

Combine all ingredients except salt and cilantro in a saucepan and add water to cover by about 1 inch. 

Cook at a steady simmer until lentils and rhubarb are quite soft, 20 to 30 minutes. 

Remove cloves and, if you like, cardamom pods. 

Add salt, then taste and adjust seasoning. Garnish with cilantro and serve.
